Name: battery cell production, Li-ion, LiMn2O4 | battery cell, Li-ion, LiMn2O4 | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
Description: This dataset includes a method of producing a lithium ion single cell. Lithium ion move from the cathode (LiMn2O4) into the electrolyte (LiPF6 in ethylenecarbonate) through the micropores of the sepeartor into the anode (lithium ion intercalation). During the charging phase. During the discharge of the battery the Li+-ions move back into the cathode.
